full_text: In the Name of the Republic of Mexico and as Officer of the Civil State of this city, I certify truths, that in Page 156 and 157 in Book Number 71 of Births, corresponding to the year 1939 that exists in the Office under my charge, a certificate is entered as follows: At Margin 230, Birth of the child DELTA MARIA FERNANDEZ, daughter of Amado Fernandez, 27 yrs, and of Prisciliana Paredez, 25 yrs. At center. In La Villa de Halacho, the 26 days of the month of September 1939, being the 8 hours, before me Bernabe Pavon Espadas Officer of the Civil Registrar of th this city and its jurisdiction, appeared the citizen Amado Fernandez 26 yrs married, shoe repairer, native and neighbor of this city and stated that in house number 106 of Street 21 of the same, the child DELTA MARIA FERNANDEZ, was born, the 27th day of the past August, the 8 hours his daughter and of Prisciliana Paredez, 25 yrs. married, seamstress, native and neighbor of this city. Granddaughter of: Paternal: Marcelino Fernandez and Filomena Al- media deceased. Maternal: Manuel Paredez pf this neighborhood and Antonia Manzanero deceased. Witnesses present: Melecio Mijangos, 30 yrs. married, coppersmith and Aurelio Almeida, 52 yrs. laborer, single, both of this neigh- borhood. This record is raised and is read conformed, signed for constancy. Bernabe Pavon E. - Amado Fernaneez - Melecio Mijangos H. - Aurelio Almeida - Rubrical. Is a true copy taken from its original that exists in the Files of this of- fice and in petition of the interested party, issued the present certifica- tion in Halacho, Yucatan, the 18 days of the month of May 1978. The Officer of the Civil Registrar Delgy Nuemi Pavon Lopez
